column37: View Tips: For more space on your screen, please minimize the ribbon by clicking on the "^" on the top right-hand corner of your screen or zoom out using the view controls on the bottom-right hand corner of your screen.

column1: Welcome to Financial Modeling and Valuation Step 2 of 7!
Change only the BLUE fonts, then go to Step 3 on the next tab.
Orange Shaded Cells = Sparklines (for trend analysis)

column37: Note from Chris: Please make sure to close the groups by clicking on "1" to the left and slightly above column A or you will see quarterly numbers in this sparkline column.

column1: REVENUE BREAKDOWN (feeds into Income Statement on the next tab) $ Value in 000's
